verses.verse: <S%H4428>Behold,<s%> a king shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall <S%H8323>rule<s%> in <S%H4941>justice.<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> shall be as a hiding <S%H4224>place<s%> from the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and a <S%H5643>covert<s%> from the <S%H2230>storm,<s%> as <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in a dry <S%H6724>place,<s%> as the <S%H6738>shade<s%> of a <S%H3515>large<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> in a <S%H5889>weary<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of those who <S%H7200>see<s%> will not be <S%H8159>dim,<s%> and the <S%H241>ears<s%> of those who <S%H8085>hear<s%> will <S%H7181>listen.<s%>

The <S%H3824>heart<s%> of the <S%H4116>rash<s%> will <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H5926>stammerers<s%> will be <S%H4116>ready<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6703>plainly.<s%>
The <S%H5036>fool<s%> will no longer be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5081>noble,<s%> nor the <S%H3596>scoundrel<s%> <S%H559>be<s%> highly <S%H7771>respected.<s%>

For the <S%H5036>fool<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5039>folly,<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> to <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H2612>profanity,<s%> and to <S%H1696>utter<s%> <S%H8442>error<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> To make <S%H7324>empty<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and to cause the <S%H4945>drink<s%> of the <S%H6771>thirsty<s%> to <S%H2637>fail.<s%>

The <S%H3627>ways<s%> of the <S%H3596>scoundrel<s%> are <S%H7451>evil.<s%> He <S%H3289>devises<s%> wicked <S%H2154>devices<s%> to <S%H2254>destroy<s%> the <S%H6041>humble<s%> with <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H561>words,<s%> even when the <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H4941>right.<s%>
But the <S%H5081>noble<s%> <S%H3289>devises<s%> <S%H5081>noble<s%> <S%H5081>things;<s%> and he will continue in noble <S%H5081>things.<s%>

Rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> you <S%H802>women<s%> who are at <S%H7600>ease!<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice!<s%> You <S%H982>careless<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H565>speech!<s%>

For <S%H3117>days<s%> beyond a <S%H8141>year<s%> you will be <S%H7264>troubled,<s%> you careless <S%H982>women;<s%> for the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail.<s%> The <S%H625>harvest<s%> <S%H935>won't<s%> come.

<S%H2729>Tremble,<s%> you women who are at <S%H7600>ease!<s%> Be <S%H7264>troubled,<s%> you careless <S%H982>ones!<s%> <S%H6584>Strip<s%> <S%H6209>yourselves,<s%> make yourselves naked, and <S%H2290>put<s%> sackcloth on your <S%H2504>waist.<s%>
<S%H5594>Beat<s%> your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> for the <S%H2531>pleasant<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> for the <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1612>vine.<s%>

<S%H6975>Thorns<s%> and <S%H8068>briars<s%> will come <S%H5927>up<s%> on my <S%H5971>people<s%>'s <S%H127>land;<s%> <S%H1004>yes,<s%> on all the houses of <S%H4885>joy<s%> in the <S%H5947>joyous<s%> <S%H7151>city.<s%>

For the <S%H759>palace<s%> will be <S%H5203>forsaken.<s%> The <S%H1995>populous<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> will be <S%H5800>deserted.<s%> The <S%H6076>hill<s%> and the <S%H975>watchtower<s%> will be for <S%H4631>dens<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> a <S%H4885>delight<s%> for wild <S%H6501>donkeys,<s%> a <S%H4829>pasture<s%> of <S%H5739>flocks;<s%>

Until the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> is <S%H6168>poured<s%> on us from on <S%H4791>high,<s%> and the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> becomes a fruitful <S%H3759>field,<s%> and the fruitful <S%H3759>field<s%> is <S%H2803>considered<s%> a <S%H3293>forest.<s%>
Then <S%H4941>justice<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> will <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the fruitful <S%H3759>field.<s%>

The <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> will be <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and the <S%H5656>effect<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H8252>quietness<s%> and <S%H983%H99999>confidence<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
My <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H3427>live<s%> in a <S%H7965>peaceful<s%> <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> in <S%H4009>safe<s%> <S%H4908>dwellings,<s%> and in <S%H7600>quiet<s%> resting <S%H4496>places.<s%>
Though <S%H1258>hail<s%> <S%H3381>flattens<s%> the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H8213>leveled<s%> <S%H8218>completely.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are you who <S%H2232>sow<s%> beside all <S%H4325>waters,<s%> who send <S%H7971>out<s%> the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox<s%> and the <S%H2543>donkey.<s%>
